name: 布赖恩·道尔 Brian Doyle
intro: Brian Doyle-Murray（布赖恩·道尔）was born on October 31, 1945 in Chicago, Illinois, USA. He is an actor and writer, known for Groundhog Day (1993), Caddyshack (1980) and Wayne's World (1992). He has been married to Christina Stauffer since August 28, 2000
birthplace: 美国,伊利诺伊州,芝加哥
